gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 131, Pistons 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeat the Pistons, 131-110.  Domantas Sabonis (37 points, 10 rebounds, 13 assists) recorded his ninth triple-double of the season for the Kings, while Keegan Murray added 32 points, five rebounds and five 3PM in the victory.  Bojan Bogdanovic tallied 26 points and five rebounds for the Pistons in the losing effort.  The Kings improve to 22-14 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 3-34.
